## ToolboxCategory.setSelected() method

Sets the current category as selected.

**Signature:**

```typescript

```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  isSelected | boolean | True if this category is selected, false otherwise. |
